com.henryrobbins.creator

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.henryrobbins.creator.Statistics
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectedStatistics, GridStatistics, StructuralStatistics, UndirectedStatistics

    public abstract class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains a list of statistics for a hashmap representation of a graph
